clinical_study.brief_title: Headache Inducing Effect of Levcromakalim in Migraine With Aura Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Headache Inducing Effect of Levcromakalim in Migraine With Aura Patients

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the role of KATP channels in migraine with aura patients.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before (-10 min) and after infusion (+12 hours) of levcromakalim compared with before and after infusion of saline
Before (-10 min) and after infusion (+12 hours) of levcromakalim compared with before and after infusion of saline
Before (-10 min) and after infusion (+12 hours) of levcromakalim compared with before and after infusion of saline

secondary_outcome.measure: The area under the curve (AUC) for headache
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (-10 min) and after infusion (+12 hours) of levcromakalim compared with before and after infusion of saline
After including the patients in the study.
secondary_outcome.description: Direct interview with the 1 st degree family memeber for included patients according to international classification of headaches.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (-10 min) and after infusion (+2 hours) of levcromakalim compared with before and after infusion of saline
secondary_outcome.description: Change in heart rate measured in Beats per minute (BPM)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before (-10 min) and after infusion (+2 hours) of levcromakalim compared with before and after infusion of saline
secondary_outcome.description: Change in blood pressure measured in mmHg

intervention.description: To investigate the role of levcromakalim compared with placebo in migraine with aura patients
To investigate the role of levcromakalim compared with placebo in migraine with aura patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Migraine with aura patients of both sexes.
- 18-60 years.
- 50-100 kg.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Headache less than 48 hours before the tests start
- Daily consumption of drugs of any kind other than oral contraceptives
- Pregnant or nursing women.
- Cardiovascular disease of any kind, including cerebrovascular diseases.
